A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong fan of Star Wars\, this movie shattered my expectations in the most negative way possible. Major plot holes\, unnecessary diversions\, and disappointing revelations made this movie frustrating for a loyal fan. Change in a series is good; it keeps both old and young generations intrigued. However\, change for the sake of itself with no homage to the saga from which it originates is a true shame.
